extends java.lang.Object

    • Method Detail

      • placeBet

        public boolean placeBet(Auction auction,
                        java.lang.String userLogin,
                        Bet bet,
                        java.sql.Timestamp betTime)
                 throws ServiceException,
                        BetException
        Places a bet in a database if a bet is correct. A bet must be greater than MIN bet (and than a current auction bet by 5$).
        Specified by:
        placeBet in interface UserOperationService
        Parameters:
        auction - - an auction in which bet will be placed.
        userLogin - - a login of user which has placed bet.
        bet - - a bet.
        betTime - - time when bet was placed.
        Returns:
        true - if a bet has been placed. false - if a bet hasn't been placed.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
        BetException - - if a bet is incorrect.

      • payForLot

        public boolean payForLot(java.lang.Integer auctionId,
                         java.lang.Integer lotId)
                  throws ServiceException
        Pays for a lot in a database.
        Specified by:
        payForLot in interface UserOperationService
        Parameters:
        auctionId - - an ID of an auction for which lot a user pays.
        lotId - - an ID of lot for which a user pays.
        Returns:
        true - if successful. false - if not successful.
        Throws:
        ServiceException - - if an error occurred during operation in a database.
